casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Napier Sandford FULLER 378P18-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2019

Napier Sandford Fuller, For Fuller, Napier Sandford

Peter A. Regulski, Mary Carla Babb, Assistant Attorneys General, Blake M. Courlang, James R. Woodall, Jr., District Attorneys, For State of North Carolina *31The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of March 2019 by Defendant for Petition for Rehearing of an Administrative Matter:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of June 2019."
